_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The four that corrupt an assembly [an4.2: A monk who is unethical and of bad character
A nun who is unethical and of bad character
A layman who is unethical and of bad character
A laywoman who is unethical and of bad character
A monk who is ethical and of good character
A nun who is ethical and of good character
A layman who is ethical and of good character
A laywoman who is ethical and of good character
